methods.description: Get SKU Bindings by SKU ID

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU's unique identifier in the marketplace.

responses.description: Array containing objects with information about each SKU Binding.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: ID that identifies the seller in the marketplace. It can be the same as the seller name or a unique number. Check the **Sellers management** section in the Admin to get the correct ID.

parameters.name: skuSellerId
parameters.description: SKU ID in the seller's store.

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: ID that identifies the seller in the marketplace. It can be the same as the seller name or a unique number. Check the **Sellers management** section in the Admin to get the correct ID.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU's unique identifier in the marketplace.

parameters.name: sellerSkuId
parameters.description: SKU ID in the seller's store.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Defines if the SKU binding is active.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Amount of results.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

methods.description: Change Notification with Seller ID and Seller SKU ID

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: ID that identifies the seller in the marketplace. It can be the same as the seller name or a unique number. Check the **Sellers management** section in the Admin to get the correct ID.

parameters.name: sellerSkuId
parameters.description: ID of the binding of the seller with the SKU.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: A string that identifies the SKU in the marketplace. This is the ID that the marketplace will use to look for the SKU whose change the seller wants to inform. If the marketplace finds this ID, it responds with status code `200`. Otherwise, it responds with status code `404`.
